title: TAYLOR SWIFT's Bassist Is A Big Metal Fan, Can Shred DREAM THEATER On Bass
description: Amos Heller rips. The post TAYLOR SWIFT's Bassist Is A Big Metal Fan, Can Shred DREAM THEATER On Bass appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: If anyone's metal band needs a bassist, maybe you ought to call Taylor Swift's master of the low end Amos Heller. In a new video from bass company Dingwall, Heller shows off his stellar bass chops by ripping through Dream Theater's classic Awake track "Caught In A Web". Which I guess isn't too surprising, considering he's a professional bassist operating in arguably one of the biggest touring acts in the entire world. It's just cool to see the guy is also a metal fan. Speaking of Heller and his mastery of bass, you really should check out his bass-centric cover of Metallica's "Blackened" below as well. It's an absolute fucking ripper that would put a smile on Lars Ulrich's face… if he didn't turn the volume on this, too. Want More Metal?
